graphql.query:
query customers {
    customers(
        first:11
        page: 1
        input: {
            # id: 1
            # name: "test"
            # gender: MALE
            # email: "test@test.com"
            # dateOfBirth: "1993-07-11"
            # groupName: "VIP"
            # phone: "9876543210"
            # status: true
        }
    ) {
        paginatorInfo {
            count
            currentPage
            lastPage
            total
        }
        data {
            id
            firstName
            lastName
            name
            gender
            dateOfBirth
            email
            phone
            image
            imageUrl
            status
            password
            apiToken
            customerGroupId
            subscribedToNewsLetter
            isVerified
            isSuspended
            token
            notes {
                id
                customerId
                note
                customerNotified
                createdAt
                updatedAt
            }
            createdAt
            updatedAt
            customerGroup {
                id
                name
                code
                isUserDefined
                createdAt
                updatedAt
            }
        }
    }
}

query customer {
    customer(id: 3) {
        id
        firstName
        lastName
        name
        gender
        dateOfBirth
        email
        phone
        image
        imageUrl
        status
        password
        apiToken
        customerGroupId
        subscribedToNewsLetter
        isVerified
        isSuspended
        token
        notes {
            id
            customerId
            note
            customerNotified
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        customerGroup {
            id
            name
            code
            isUserDefined
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
    }
}

mutation createCustomer {
    createCustomer(input: {
        firstName: "John"
        lastName: "Doe"
        email: "johndoe@example.com"
      	gender: MALE
      	dateOfBirth: "11/07/1993"
        customerGroupId: 1
        phone: "9876543210"
    }) {
        id
        firstName
        lastName
        name
        gender
        dateOfBirth
        email
        phone
        image
        imageUrl
        status
        password
        apiToken
        customerGroupId
        subscribedToNewsLetter
        isVerified
        isSuspended
        token
        notes {
            id
            customerId
            note
            customerNotified
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        customerGroup {
            id
            name
            code
            isUserDefined
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
        success
    }
}

mutation updateCustomer {
    updateCustomer(id: 7, input: {
        firstName: "John"
        lastName: "Doe"
        email: "johndoe@example.com"
      	gender: FEMALE
      	dateOfBirth: "1996-05-10"
        customerGroupId: 2
        phone: "9876543210"
        status: true
        isSuspended: false
    }) {
        id
        firstName
        lastName
        name
        gender
        dateOfBirth
        email
        phone
        image
        imageUrl
        status
        password
        apiToken
        customerGroupId
        subscribedToNewsLetter
        isVerified
        isSuspended
        token
        notes {
            id
            customerId
            note
            customerNotified
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        customerGroup {
            id
            name
            code
            isUserDefined
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
        success
    }
}

query customerAddresses {
    customerAddresses(
        first:11
        page: 1
        input: {
            # id: 1
            # customerId: 1
            # companyName: "Test"
            # firstName: "Jhon"
            # lastName: "Doe"
            # address1: "h-28 arv park"
            # country: "IN"
            # state: "UP"
            # city: "AGRA"
            # postcode: "201301"
            # phone: "9876543210"
            # vatId: "989898"
            # defaultAddress: true
        }
    ) {
        paginatorInfo {
            count
            currentPage
            lastPage
            total
        }
        data {
            id
            customerId
            companyName
            firstName
            lastName
            address
            country
            state
            city
            postcode
            phone
            vatId
            addressType
            defaultAddress
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
    }
}

query customerAddress {
    customerAddress(id: 2) {
        id
        customerId
        companyName
        firstName
        lastName
        address
        country
        state
        city
        postcode
        phone
        vatId
        addressType
        defaultAddress
        createdAt
        updatedAt
    }
}

mutation createCustomerAddress {
    createCustomerAddress(input: {
        customerId: 7
        companyName: "Stark Industries"
        vatId: "INV12345678902"
        firstName: "John"
        lastName: "Doe"
        address: "3180 Bluff Street"
        city: "GLEN CAMPBELL"
        postcode: "555"
        country: "US"
        state: "PA"
        phone: "987654321"
        email: "johndoe@example.com"
        defaultAddress: true
    }) {
        id
        addressType
        parentAddressId
        useForShipping
        customerId
        cartId
        orderId
        firstName
        lastName
        gender
        companyName
        address
        city
        state
        country
        postcode
        email
        phone
        vatId
        defaultAddress
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        success
    }
}

mutation updateCustomerAddress {
    updateCustomerAddress(id: 7, input: {
        customerId: 7
        companyName: "Stark Industries"
        vatId: "INV12345678902"
        firstName: "John"
        lastName: "Doe"
        address: "3180 Bluff Street"
        city: "GLEN CAMPBELL"
        postcode: "555"
        country: "US"
        state: "PA"
        phone: "987654321"
        email: "johndoe@example.com"
        defaultAddress: true
    }) {
        id
        addressType
        parentAddressId
        useForShipping
        customerId
        cartId
        orderId
        firstName
        lastName
        gender
        companyName
        address
        city
        state
        country
        postcode
        email
        phone
        vatId
        defaultAddress
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        success
    }
}

mutation setAsDefaultAddress {
    setAsDefaultAddress(
        id: 8
        customerId: 7
    ) {
        id
        addressType
        parentAddressId
        useForShipping
        customerId
        cartId
        orderId
        firstName
        lastName
        gender
        companyName
        address
        city
        state
        country
        postcode
        email
        phone
        vatId
        defaultAddress
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        success
    }
}

query review {
    review(id: 1) {
        id
        name
        title
        rating
        comment
        status
        productId
        customerId
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        images {
            id
            reviewId
            type
            mimeType
            path
            url
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
    }
}

mutation updateReview {
    updateReview(
        id: 1
        status: APPROVED
    ) {
        id
        name
        title
        rating
        comment
        status
        productId
        customerId
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        images {
            id
            reviewId
            type
            mimeType
            path
            url
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
        success
    }
}

query cmsPageTranslation {
    cmsPageTranslation(
        id: 1,
        input: {
            cmsPageId: 1
            # id: 1
            # pageTitle: "test"
            # urlKey: "test"
            # metaTitle: "test"
            # metaKeywords: "test"
            # locale: "en"
        }
    ) {
        id
        urlKey
        metaDescription
        metaTitle
        pageTitle
        metaKeywords
        htmlContent
        locale
        cmsPageId
    }
}

query catalogRule {
    catalogRule(id: 2) {
        id
        name
        description
        startsFrom
        endsTill
        status
        conditionType
        conditions
        endOtherRules
        actionType
        discountAmount
        sortOrder
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        channels {
            id
            code
            name
        }
        customerGroups {
            id
            code
            name
        }
    }
}

mutation createCatalogRule {
    createCatalogRule(input: {
        name: "First Catalog Rule"
        status: false
        description: "First Catalog Rule 10% off"
        channels: [1]
        customerGroups: [1, 2]
        startsFrom: "2021-11-20 13:43:32"
        endsTill: "2021-12-23 13:43:32"
        conditionType: 1
        conditions: [{
                    attribute: "product|category_ids",
                    operator: "{}",
                    attributeType: "multiselect",
                    value: ["1", "3"]
                },	{
                    attribute: "product|sku",
                    operator: "==",
                    attributeType: "text",
                    value: ["phone"]
                }]
        sortOrder: 1
        actionType: "by_percent"
        discountAmount: 10.5
        endOtherRules: true
    }) {
        id
        name
        description
        startsFrom
        endsTill
        status
        conditionType
        conditions
        endOtherRules
        actionType
        discountAmount
        sortOrder
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        channels {
            id
            code
            name
            description
            theme
            hostname
            defaultLocaleId
            baseCurrencyId
            rootCategoryId
            inventorySources {
                id
                code
                name
                description
                contactName
                contactEmail
                contactNumber
                contactFax
                country
                state
                city
                street
                postcode
                priority
                latitude
                longitude
                status
            }
            logoUrl
        }
        customerGroups {
            id
            name
            code
            isUserDefined
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
        catalogRuleProducts {
            id
            startsFrom
            endsTill
            discountAmount
            actionType
            endOtherRules
            sortOrder
            catalogRuleId
            channelId
            customerGroupId
            productId
            product {
                id
                type
                attributeFamilyId
                sku
                parentId
                variants {
                    id
                    type
                    attributeFamilyId
                    sku
                    parentId
                }
            }
        }
        catalogRuleProductPrices {
            id
            price
            ruleDate
            startsFrom
            endsTill
            productId
            catalogRuleId
            channelId
            customerGroupId
        }
    }
}

query cartRules {
    cartRules (
        first:11
        page: 1
    ){
        paginatorInfo {
            count
            currentPage
            lastPage
            total
        }
        data {
            id
            name
            description
            startsFrom
            endsTill
            status
            couponType
            useAutoGeneration
            usagePerCustomer
            usesPerCoupon
            timesUsed
            conditionType
            conditions
            actions
            endOtherRules
            usesAttributeConditions
            actionType
            discountAmount
            discountQuantity
            discountStep
            applyToShipping
            freeShipping
            sortOrder
            createdAt
            updatedAt
            cartRuleChannels {
                id
                code
                name
                description
                theme
                hostname
                defaultLocaleId
                baseCurrencyId
                rootCategoryId
                inventorySources {
                    id
                    code
                    name
                    description
                    contactName
                    contactEmail
                    contactNumber
                    contactFax
                    country
                    state
                    city
                    street
                    postcode
                    priority
                    latitude
                    longitude
                    status
                }
                logoUrl
            }
            cartRuleCustomerGroups {
                id
                name
                code
                isUserDefined
                createdAt
                updatedAt
            }
            cartRuleCoupon {
                id
                code
                usageLimit
                usagePerCustomer
                isPrimary
                timesUsed
                expiredAt
                type
                cartRuleId
                createdAt
                updatedAt
                couponUsage {
                    id
                    timesUsed
                    cartRuleCouponId
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

mutation createCartRule {
    createCartRule(input: {
        name: "First Cart Rule (10%)"
        description: "You can avail 10% off by using this cart rule."
        channels: [1]
        customerGroups: [1, 2]
        status: false
        couponType: 1
        useAutoGeneration: false
        couponCode: "ABCDE"
        usesPerCoupon: 2
        usagePerCustomer: 3
        startsFrom: "2021-11-20 13:43:32"
        endsTill: "2021-12-23 13:43:32"
        sortOrder: 1
        timesUsed: 2
        conditionType: true
        conditions: [{
            attribute: "cart|base_sub_total",
            operator: ">=",
            attributeType: "price",
            value: "10"
        },	{
            attribute: "product|category_ids",
            operator: "{}",
            attributeType: "multiselect",
            value: ["3"]
        }]
        usesAttributeConditions: true
        actionType: "by_percent"
        discountAmount: 5
        discountQuantity: 1
        discountStep: 2
        applyToShipping: false
        freeShipping: false
        endOtherRules: true
    }) {
        id
        name
        description
        startsFrom
        endsTill
        status
        couponType
        useAutoGeneration
        usagePerCustomer
        usesPerCoupon
        timesUsed
        conditionType
        conditions
        actions
        endOtherRules
        usesAttributeConditions
        actionType
        discountAmount
        discountQuantity
        discountStep
        applyToShipping
        freeShipping
        sortOrder
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        cartRuleChannels {
            id
            code
            name
            description
            theme
            hostname
            defaultLocaleId
            baseCurrencyId
            rootCategoryId
            inventorySources {
                id
                code
                name
                description
                contactName
                contactEmail
                contactNumber
                contactFax
                country
                state
                city
                street
                postcode
                priority
                latitude
                longitude
                status
            }
            logoUrl
        }
        cartRuleCustomerGroups {
            id
            name
            code
            isUserDefined
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
        cartRuleCoupon {
            id
            code
            usageLimit
            usagePerCustomer
            isPrimary
            timesUsed
            expiredAt
            type
            cartRuleId
            createdAt
            updatedAt
            couponUsage {
                id
                timesUsed
                cartRuleCouponId
            }
        }
    }
}

mutation updateCartRule {
    updateCartRule(id: 1, input: {
        name: "First Cart Rule (5%)"
        description: "You can avail 5% off by using this cart rule."
        channels: [1]
        customerGroups: [1, 2, 3]
        status: true
        couponType: 1
        useAutoGeneration: true

        discountAmount: 5

        freeShipping: true
        endOtherRules: true
    }) {

        timesUsed

                contactNumber

                city
                street

                priority
                latitude

                status
            }
            logoUrl
        }
        cartRuleCustomerGroups {
            id
            name
            code
            isUserDefined
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
        cartRuleCoupon {
            id
            code
            usageLimit

query campaigns{
    campaigns(
        first:11
        page: 1
        input: {
        # id: 1
        # name: "test"
        # subject: "test"
        # event: 1
        # emailTemplate: 1 
        # channel: 1
        # customerGroup: 1
    }){
        data{
            id
            name
            subject 
            status
            channel {
                id
                code
                name
                description
                theme
                hostname
                defaultLocaleId
                baseCurrencyId
                rootCategoryId
                inventorySources {
                    id
                    code
                    name
                    description
                    contactName
                    contactEmail
                    contactNumber
                    contactFax
                    country
                    state
                    city
                    street
                    postcode
                    priority
                    latitude
                    longitude
                    status
                }
                logoUrl
            }
            customerGroup {
                id
                name
                code
                isUserDefined
                createdAt
                updatedAt
                success 
            }
            emailTemplate{
                id
                name
                content
                status
            }
            event{
                 id
                name
                description
                date
            }
        }
    }
}

query campaign{
    campaign(id: 1) {
        id
        name
        subject 
        status
        channel {
            id
            code
            name
            description
            theme
            hostname
            defaultLocaleId
            baseCurrencyId
            rootCategoryId
            inventorySources {
                id
                code
                name
                description
                contactName
                contactEmail
                contactNumber
                contactFax
                country
                state
                city
                street
                postcode
                priority
                latitude
                longitude
                status
            }
            logoUrl
        }
        customerGroup {
            id
            name
            code
            isUserDefined
            createdAt

query channels {
    channels (
        first:11
        page: 1
        input: {
            # id: 1
            # code: "Test"
            # name: "custom"
            # hostname: "test"
        }
    ) {
        paginatorInfo {
            count
            currentPage
            lastPage
            total
        }
        data {
            id
            code
            name
            description
            timezone
            theme
            hostname
            logoUrl
            faviconUrl
            homeSeo {
                metaTitle
                metaKeywords
                metaDescription
            }
            isMaintenanceOn
            allowedIps
            rootCategoryId
            defaultLocaleId
            baseCurrencyId
            createdAt
            updatedAt
            maintenanceModeText
            description
            locales {
                id
                code
                name
                direction
                logoUrl
                createdAt
                updatedAt
            }
            defaultLocale {
                id
                code
                name
                direction
                logoUrl
                createdAt
                updatedAt
            }
            currencies {
                id
                code
                name
                symbol
                decimal
                createdAt
                updatedAt
                exchangeRate {
                    id
                    targetCurrency
                    rate
                    createdAt
                    updatedAt
                    currency {
                        id
                    }
                }
            }
            baseCurrency {
                id
                code
                name
                symbol
                decimal
                createdAt
                updatedAt
                exchangeRate {
                    id
                    targetCurrency
                    rate
                    createdAt
                    updatedAt
                    currency {
                        id
                    }
                }
            }
            inventorySources {
                id
                code
                name
                description
                contactName
                contactEmail
                contactNumber
                contactFax
                country
                state
                city
                street
                postcode
                priority
                latitude
                longitude
                status
            }
            rootCategory {
                id
            }
        }
    }
}

mutation userLogin($input: CreateUserLoginInput!) {
    userLogin(input: $input) {
        status
        success
        accessToken
        tokenType
        expiresIn
        user {
            id
            name
            email
            password
            apiToken
            roleId
            image
            status
            createdAt
            updatedAt
            role {
                name
                description
                permissionType
                permissions
            }
        }
    }
}

query user {
    user(id: 1) {
        id
        name
        email
        password
        apiToken
        status
        roleId
        image
        rememberToken
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        role {
            id
            name
            description
            permissionType
            permissions
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
    }
}

mutation createUser ($input : CreateUserInput!){
    createUser(input: $input) {
        id
        name
        email
        password
        apiToken
        status
        roleId
        image
        rememberToken
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        role {
            id
            name
            description
            permissionType
            permissions
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
        success
    }
}

mutation createRole {
    createRole(input: {
        name: "Testing Again"
        description: "TEST CASES IS CHECKED"
        # Value sholud be
        # CUSTOM or ALL
        permissionType: CUSTOM
        permissions: [
            "catalog",
            "catalog.families",
            "catalog.families.edit",
            "customers",
            "customers.customers",
            "customers.customers.create",
            "customers.customers.delete",
            "customers.groups",
            "customers.groups.create",
            "customers.groups.edit",
            "customers.groups.delete",
            "customers.reviews",
            "customers.reviews.edit",
            "customers.reviews.delete"
        ]
    }) {
        id
        name
        description
        permissionType
        permissions
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        success
    }
}

mutation createTaxRate {

        country: "IN",
        state: "",
        # isZip: "",

        # zipTo: "",
        taxRate: 4.33,
    }) {
        id
        identifier
        isZip
        zipCode
        zipFrom
        zipTo
        state
        country
        taxRate
        taxCategories {
            id
            code
            name
        }
        success
    }
}
